Google Translate

Effective March 24, 2023: If you wish to receive further information about the most recent WARN Notice submitted to the Office of Workforce Development (OWD), sign up for our WARN Notice Mailing List.  WARN Notice updates will be emailed during business operating hours.



To receive any previous WARN Notices, submit an open records request to  recordscustodian@dhewd.mo.gov.



For all other inquiries, please contact Heather Dolce, Assistant Commissioner for Communications and Outreach at heather.dolce@dhewd.mo.gov.

Click here to learn more about the WARN Notice System

The Missouri Office of Workforce Development is a proud partner of the American Job Center network.

Missouri Department of Higher Education and Workforce Development is an equal opportunity employer/program.
Auxiliary aids and services are available upon request to individuals with disabilities. Missouri Relay 711.
